summary: A color scheme mimicking the way NEdit highlights C++ code
name: NEdit
description: This color scheme takes the colors from NEdit (http://www.nedit.org/) C++ defaults. Note that NEdit recognizes a bit more syntax, so this "Vim version" is somewhat inferior to the original.
install_details:
In Vim 6, simply copy this file into your "$VIMRUNTIME/colors/" or "$HOME/.vim/colors/", then use ":colorscheme oceandeep". Otherwise, just ":source" it.

The script might work fine in Vim 5.7 as well.
